mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, sort, area_id, code, type, grade, address, zip_code, master, phone, fax, email, useable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, grade_level ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentIds, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{areaId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{grade, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{master, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useable, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{gradeLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sys_office WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

DELETE FROM sys_office WHERE id in
#{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.parent_id parentId, a.parent_ids parentIds, a.name name, a.sort sort, a.area_id areaId, a.code code, a.type type, a.grade grade, a.address address, a.zip_code zipCode, a.master master, a.phone phone, a.fax fax, a.email email, a.useable useable, a.primary_person primaryPerson, a.deputy_person deputyPerson, a.create_by createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createDate, a.update_by updateBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateDate, a.remarks remarks, a.del_flag delFlag, a.grade_level gradeLevel FROM sys_office a WHERE a.id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT a.id id, a.parent_id parentId, a.parent_ids parentIds, a.name name, a.sort sort, a.area_id areaId, a.code code, a.type type, a.grade grade, a.address address, a.zip_code zipCode, a.master master, a.phone phone, a.fax fax, a.email email, a.useable useable, a.primary_person primaryPerson, a.deputy_person deputyPerson, a.create_by createBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createDate, a.update_by updateBy, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') updateDate, a.remarks remarks, a.del_flag delFlag, a.grade_level gradeLevel FROM sys_office a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.id ASC
SELECT count(*) FROM sys_office a WHERE 1=1
